title: The Cricket on the Hearth
description: binding: full leather buckram; lettering and design stamped in green; endpapers: white laid; slip case: burgundy paper over cardboard, printed label affixed (damaged); deckle-edged, two; top edge dyed (?) blue-green; type: Golden Cockerel; 98 pp.
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
